ADAM - Accelerated Design of Architectured Materials

ADAM - Accelerated Design of Architectured Materials

ADAM, Accelerated Design of Architectured Materials, is a target project of the French Priority Research Program DIADEM, Development of Innovative Materials using Artificial Intelligence. By using data mining and AI sciences in the loop of materials design, the ADAM project wish to discover and speed up the design of novel architectured materials (i) with optimized mesostructures for enhanced physical and mechanical properties, (ii) which represent breakthroughs with respect to existing solutions.
France 2030 / DIADEM / CNRS / CEA / ANR
